pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chain Binomial Models for Analysis of Infectious Disease Data // Implements the chain binomial model for analysis of infectious disease data. Contains functions for calculating probabilities of the final size of infectious disease outbreaks using the method from D. Ludwig (1975) doi:10.1016/0025-5564(75)90119-4 and for outbreaks that are not concluded, from Lindstrm et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2403.03948. The package also contains methods for estimation and regression analysis of secondary attack rates.
